# QUE

  1. genitive / possessive / reflexive pronoun marker 𔕰 𒆤 kwi/kwa qui/qua
  2. 𐀤 qe, καί kaí, und auch, aussie, and
  3. And I ak ego
  4. Question qui que qua? 𒆠 𒂊

𔕰 kwi/kwa qui qua que 𐀒 ko 𐘺 •KO 𐀒 Q

𒆪𒉿 -ku-wa- -que Luwian particle

𒀝 -ak que genitive case marker

QUA ≈ ŠA 𒐼 𒎗 𒄭 4

Adjectives

Adjectives via suffix -que -𒋡 -qa -𒂵 -GA 𒆗𒂵 kraftig
Adjectives via suffix -ig -ique -y -𒋡 -qa -ak -ակ -ɑk -açʰ -աչ -ig Adjectives via suffix -ich -ig -lig -lich -like ly-
Adjectives via suffix -lich -like ly- alig ?

DE ⇔ QE adjective suffix
կանաչ kanaçʰ grünig
սպիտակ əspitɑk

pronoun que

𔕰 kwi/kwa qui/qua/que REL relative pronoun
𒆤 KE4 -que 𒆤 GE₂ 𒆤 GI₂ < quod
𒆤 kid > 𒆧𒆠𒆤 Kiš-ke4 of Kish

qui qua que > wie who quad > what …

con > que/von

ad'que ak auch

𐀤 qe Bohairic: ⲕⲁⲓ (kai), ⲕⲉ (ke), ⲛⲉⲙ (nem), ⲟⲩⲟϩ (ouoh)
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲓ (kai), ⲕⲉ (ke), ⲙⲛ (mn), ⲁⲩⲱ (auō)

"JA"

Question

𒆠 ki que? quoi? "how?"
𒂊𒉡𒈠 ᵏe-nu-ma 𓍿 𓈖 𓌙 𓅯 | whence | quand
𒂊𒉡𒈠 when
